name: Argosy
overview:
Established in 1987, Argosy Research Inc. is a technology company founded in Taiwan. Over the past 20 years, Argosy has made its commitment to be a top-quality developer and manufacturer of leading edge storage and mobile technology products. Headquartered in Taiwan, Argosy has three subsidiaries operating in North America, Europe, and China. We focus on innovations and applications of storage peripherals; offer more options for envisioning digital life, and turn user expectations into realities. With our reliable products and service, we provide our customers with better quality of life and more value added.

Argosy has successfully developed a variety of HD hard disk drive media players, USB/ IEEE 1394 external HDDs, DVD-RW drives, and PCMCIA serial cards. Argosy’s products are marketed worldwide in our own brand - “ARGOSY”, and are also distributed as OEM / ODM products by companies such as IBM & Toshiba.

Being an OEM/ODM total solution provider, Argosy focus on customersâ€™ requirements and fulfill them from the very first concept and design of a product, to research and development, to the final stage of manufacturing. And it doesnâ€™t end there. We are here to support the customers further with superior technical design, logistics control, product enhancements, and cost-down even after all the products have been packed and shipped.

For years to come, Argosy will present products featuring more advanced functions to expand our product portfolio from storage, entertainment, to security. Your smart choice is to move forward and partner with Argosy, a â€œone-stopâ€ total solution provider you can rely on.
